document.title: LESLLA
document.intro: The LESLLA corpus dates from 2003­-2005 and contains speech of 15 low educated learners of Dutch as a second language. The learners are all women. Eight learners have a Turkish background, seven learners have a Moroccan background. From these learners, data were collected over time in t... LESLLA: speech of 15 low educated learners of Dutch as a second language. The learners are all women.
